resources.string: An Acromantula is a species of giant spider, native to the rainforests of Southeast Asia, particularly Borneo where it inhabits dense jungles.
A Centaur is a magical creature whose head, torso, and arms appear to be human and are joined to a horses body.
Grindylow is a small, horned, pale-green water demon and a Dark creature.
Hippogriff is a magical creature that has the front legs, wings, and head of a giant eagle and the body, hind legs and tail of a horse.
A Pixie is a small, bright blue mischief-maker, and loves tricks and practical jokes.
